items.title: Casting: Nordic short film seeking lead actor
items.summary: Self-funded short film is looking for a bilingual lead (Danish/English). Shooting in Copenhagen late September.
items.text:
Self-funded short film is looking for a bilingual lead (Danish/English).
Shooting in Copenhagen late September.
Please send headshots and recent work.

items.title: Commercial casting: families with kids
items.message: Agency in Aarhus is seeking real families for a branded shoot. Travel and accommodation covered.
